meanings.sent1: I wore my favorite titfers to the party.
meanings.sent2: He tipped his titfers to greet the guests.
meanings.sent3: The titfers flew off in the wind, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her titfers was a crown of flowers, blooming with colors.
meanings.sent5: The titfers shielded her from the sun, like a protective canopy.

meanings.definition: To put a hat or cap on.
meanings.sent1: She carefully titfers her head before going out.
meanings.sent2: He always titfers before stepping outside.
meanings.sent3: The magician titfers a rabbit out of the hat, surprising the audience.
meanings.sent4: He titfers on his thinking cap to solve the puzzle.
meanings.sent5: Titfers your head with a hat to stay warm in winter.
